nodes.name: Join using SQL
nodes.description: This node creates a new DataFrame by performing Inner Join or Left Outer Join or Right Outer Join or Full Outer Join

fields.name: sql
fields.value: select  a.c1, a.c2, b.c3, b.c4 from fire_temp_table1 a RIGHT OUTER JOIN fire_temp_table2 b ON(a.c1=b.c1 and a.c2=b.c2)
